duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop mechanisms for monitoring project progress and intervention with key stakeholders.
Assess project issues and develop enhanced resolutions to meet or exceed productivity, quality, and customers satisfaction goals.
Work collaboratively with members of ISC functions, sites, and leadership to develop solutions to address productivity and effectiveness issues.
Manage the activities to support the data load process, current analytics projects, and dashboards with team members.
Lead projects technically and improve the skill sets of team members to advance analytical capabilities.
Develop and enable delivery mechanisms for comprehensive, actionable analytics that identify improvement opportunities for all functions of ISC.
Process standardization and documentation across all projects.
Conduct monthly meetings, newsletters, focus training for users, and functional training for team members.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Engineering or Business (Master's preferred)
Certification in Project/Program Management techniques preferred, e.g. PMP or similar
